name: Rogue Valley
description:
Immerse in a classic 90's rogue-like adventure with friends!

Join Rogue Valley, a MMO rogue-like world and explore the different dungeon levels each season along with your friends. Collect items and improve your character without limits. Our unique level-up system is focused on farming and exploring to find new challenges, earning points for your character naturally rather than having a static experience/level system.

This is not a pay-to-win game! so we don't have an in-game shop, we prefer to sell you the full game directly and give you the whole experience while we grow together in this online world in order to maintain and keep our servers active for you.

We're in early access stage, so we'll actively be enhancing your gameplay experience!
Thank you for playing with us :)
